name: ProjectHopeDemo
description:
This is a playable demo of features in PH

Controls:Arrow keys to move, DOOM2 style. Space to fire sapper, W to fire LR.

Red boxes can be destroyed with LR, and white boxes are doors, touch to open.

Also, there is a hidden tribute to FNAF in here, tell me if you can find it, it's kinda hard, the dev bots aren't a part of it.
